state.started:
Hello, ${username}!
This bot asks about your day and tracking social credits
Your social profile: /profile

Powered by @ExposedCatDev

fetch.profile:
${name} ${icon}
Social credits: ${credits} 会
Average: ${average} 会
Life quality: ${lifeQuality}/2 点

error.profileNotFound:
E: Profile not found
Maybe try to send any non-command message?
error.usersNotFound:
E: Users not found for this group
Maybe try to send any non-command message?
